title: League Screensaver is triggering my Antivirus
body: So I decided to install League Screensaver, but as soon as I tried to apply the screensaver, my Antivirus blocked it saying that there's a file which which will jeopardise my identity protection. Why are you trying to steal my identity with IDP.ARES.Generic Rito? (wish I knew how to put in a screenshot...)
